main event: A group of civilians observed a bright object moving rapidly in the sky over Benson, Arizona.
interesting points: The observation lasted between 35 and 50 minutes,The object moved east then north at a high speed,The report coincided with local newspaper articles on UFO sightings,There was also a significant meteor shower at that time,The object was visible for 3-4 minutes and emitted a bluish-white light.
